```{r}

#Date-Date
#Avg-([Average of the 24 hourly feels like temperature values in degrees Celsius])

library(fpp2)
library(forecast)
library(ggplot2)
library(readxl)

ETS <- read_excel("ETS Data.xlsx")

myts<-ts(ETS)

autoplot(myts)

myts2<-ts(ETS$Avg, frequency=365, start=(2010))

ets1<-ets(myts2)

autoplot(ets1)

cbind('Residuals' = residuals(ets1),
      'Forecast errors' = residuals(ets1,type='response')) %>%
  autoplot(facet=TRUE) + xlab("Year") + ylab("")

fc1<-forecast(ets1, h=ifelse(ets1$m>1, 2*ets1$m, 10),
level=c(80,95), fan=FALSE, simulate=FALSE, bootstrap=FALSE,
npaths=5000, PI=TRUE, lambda=ets1$lambda, biasadj=NULL)

autoplot(fc1)

fc2<-forecast(ets1, h=ifelse(ets1$m>1, 2*ets1$m, 10),
level=c(10,95), fan=FALSE, simulate=TRUE, bootstrap=FALSE,
npaths=5000, PI=TRUE, lambda=ets1$lambda, biasadj=NULL)

autoplot(fc2)

fc3<-forecast(ets1, h=ifelse(ets1$m>1, 2*ets1$m, 10),
level=c(60,95), fan=FALSE, simulate=TRUE, bootstrap=TRUE,
npaths=5000, PI=TRUE, biasadj=NULL)

autoplot(fc3)

```
